author: Reuters Editorial
title: 'Chill out' and tomb sweep at home, Taiwan says amid virus fears
description: TAIPEI (Reuters)a - Taiwan is promoting a "chill-out" approach to next week's important tomb-sweeping festival, telling people they should stay home as much as possible and make their offerings online, a novel step in its coronavirus-control measures.
content:
TAIPEI (Reuters)a - Taiwan is promoting a “chill-out” approach to next week’s important tomb-sweeping festival, telling people they should stay home as much as possible and make their offerings online, a novel step in its coronavirus-control measures.
